bulletins.title: Door(s) will not unlock when using remote control in very cold conditions.
problems: Door(s) will not unlock when using remote control in very cold conditions.
causes: Door lock mechanism frozen due to water ingress.

steps: Remove retaining screw from door lock mechanism Fig.130308.1.
Dry out door lock mechanism.
Apply aerosol grease to door lock mechanism for 2 seconds.
Refit retaining screw to door lock mechanism Fig.130308.1.
Repeat procedure for remaining doors.

bulletins.title: Engine coolant contaminated with engine oil.
problems: Engine coolant contaminated with engine oil.
causes: Heat exchanger failure due to corrosion.

steps: Replace heat exchanger.

problems: Long interior heating warm up period in cold conditions.
causes: Auxiliary heater relay 2 faulty or missing.

bulletins.title: Horn operates by itself especially when turning steering wheel.
problems: Horn operates by itself especially when turning steering wheel.
causes: Horn wiring chafes on driver's airbag module causing short circuit.

steps: Remove driver's airbag module. Remove steering wheel.
Apply insulation tape to horn wiring and connector.

bulletins.title: Knocking noise from steering column when steering wheel turned.
problems: Knocking noise from steering column when steering wheel turned.
causes: Dry contact surfaces on the steering column lower shaft sliding joint.

steps: Mark alignment of steering column lower shaft to steering rack.
Detach steering column lower shaft from steering rack.
Apply grease to steering column lower shaft at sliding joint.
Slide steering column lower shaft in and out 10 times.
Refit steering column lower shaft. Fit new steering column pinch bolt. Tightening torque: 34 Nm.

notes: Note: DO NOT exceed 60 mm of travel when sliding steering column lower shaft in and out.

bulletins.title: Oil leak from transmission.
causes: RH driveshaft not fitted correctly causing damage to driveshaft oil seal.

parts.name: Intermediate driveshaft support bearing bracket nut

steps: Fit new driveshaft oil seal.
Ensure driveshaft is pushed into transmission as far as possible.
Replace intermediate driveshaft support bearing bracket and nuts.

bulletins.title: Rain sensor unable to control wipers.
problems: Rain sensor unable to control wipers.
causes: Rain sensor function inoperative due to rain sensor mounting plate detached from windscreen.

steps: Remove rain sensor from mounting plate.
Thoroughly clean rain sensor mounting plate.
Thoroughly clean windscreen.
Apply adhesive to area indicated Fig.1173343.1.
Fit rain sensor mounting plate to windscreen.
Wait at least 5 hours for adhesive to dry before refitting rain sensor.

Install resistor fitting kit between headlamp bulb wiring harness connector and headlamp bulb.

bulletins.title: Squeaking noise when clutch pedal depressed.
problems: Squeaking noise when clutch pedal depressed.
causes: Insufficient lubrication of clutch pedal return spring.

steps: Apply grease to clutch pedal return spring.
Fully depress and release clutch pedal approximately 30 times.

bulletins.title: Tailgate opens when starting engine.
causes: Water ingress into tailgate release switch causing short circuit.

steps: Fit new tailgate release switch.
Check and adjust tailgate alignment.

bulletins.title: Tailgate opens while driving.
causes: Water ingress into tailgate release switch causing short circuit.

steps: Fit new tailgate release switch.
Check and adjust tailgate alignment.

bulletins.title: Unable to release bonnet.
causes: Bonnet release cable not located correctly in bonnet release lever mounting.

steps: Refit bonnet release cable in bonnet release lever mounting.
Fit retaining clip on bonnet release lever mounting to prevent lateral movement of bonnet release cable.
